title: ‘PUBG’ creator’s next project is an open source metaverse for everyone
description: "It won’t be PlayerUnknown’s Metaverse, just like it isn’t Tim Berners-Lee’s Internet," said Brendan “PlayerUnknown” Greene. "It has to be owned by everyone."

title: Amazon gives the Kindle a stylus and has a new way to track your sleep
description: Amazon's annual fall product launch event centered on making its disparate products work better together — and making surveillance sound helpful.

title: Call of Duty makers aid refugees of Russia’s invasion of Ukraine
description: Game developers at a new studio in Poland aimed at helping develop the popular war sim franchise have embraced those fleeing the Russian invasion.

title: AI can now create any image in seconds, bringing wonder and danger
description: Since April, DALL-E has triggered an explosion of images generated using artificial intelligence. But the technology is spreading faster than creators can shape norms around its use.

title: This jet suit could make you fly like Iron Man — if you’re rich
description: British human flight company Gravity makes an Iron Man like Jet Suit humans can purchase for a hefty sum

title: Try Guys cut ties with Ned Fulmer over workplace affair
description: Fulmer, a founding member of the comedy group that skyrocketed to YouTube fame, had cultivated an image as a doting husband and father.
